bibl.title: Foreigners at Memphis? Petrie's Racial Types.
'Never Had the Like Occurred': Egypt's View of its Past
bibl.author: ASHTON, Sally-Ann

bibl.note: À propos de l'identification de deux terres cuites "ethniques" de Memphis proposée par: William M. FLINDERS PETRIE, Memphis I = British School of Archaeology in Egypt. 14, 1908 (London, 1909) pp. 15-17 et pll. XXXV-XLIV; - The Palace of Apries (Memphis II)= British School of Archaeology in Egypt. 15, 1909 (London, 1909) pp. 16-17 et pll. XXXIII-XXXIV; - Meydum and Memphis (III) = British School of Archaeology in Egypt. 16, 1910 (London, 1910) p. 46 et pll. XLII-XLVI.
ASHTON Sally-Ann, Foreigners at Memphis? Petrie's Racial Types.
John TAIT (Ed.), 'Never Had the Like Occurred': Egypt's View of its Past = Encounters with Ancient Egypt (London, 2003) pp. 187-196, 1 fig. n./bl. et 20 fig. coul. sur 2 pll.
